content.rendered:
ParentSquare is a unified communications platform that provides a safe way for teachers, staff, and families to communicate, all in one place! We encourage all families to activate their ParentSquare account using your contact information on file with the district. Families can customize their notification preferences and download the ParentSquare mobile app through the Apple App Store here or the Google Play App Store here.

Sign in to ParentSquare

ParentSquare FAQ for Families

Q: How do I Activate My ParentSquare Account

A: We encourage all families to activate their ParentSquare account using your current contact information on file with the district at www.parentsquare.com/signin. 

Q: Can I customize my ParentSquare notifications?

A: Yes, you can customize your notification settings by going to your homepage and clicking on your name in the top right corner and selecting “My Account” from the drop-down menu. On your account page, you can find your notification settings in the top right corner and click “Change This” to customize your notifications. If you are receiving too many notifications, try changing to the “Digest” setting where you will only receive one summary message in the evening.  If you choose the “Digest setting, messages are sent between 6 – 6:30 p.m. each evening as a summary instead of instantly.

View the ParentSquare getting started guide.

Q: Do I have to login to my ParentSquare account?  

A: Yes. What a registered user can see and have access to and what a non-registered user can see and have access to will be different.  You must be registered and logged into Parent Square to complete a form or view a secure document.

Q: Why won’t ParentSquare accept the password I chose?

A:  For security purposes, ParentSquare uses a password monitoring service to detect passwords.  If a user sees “We detected that your password was exposed in a breach at another company,”  you will need to choose a more secure password to be able to activate your account.  Try adding capital and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

Q: Do I have to use ParentSquare on my phone?

A: No. You can use ParentSquare on both your phone and a regular computer. Go to the ParentSquare login page here to access your account on a computer. To access the ParentSquare App, visit the Apple App Store here or the Google Play App Store here.

Q: My email is correct in ParentSquare. Why am I not receiving emails?

A: Please check your spam to see if any ParentSquare messages ended up there, and mark them as “Not Spam.” Also, add donotreply@parentsquare.com to your email contacts so your server recognizes our messages.

Q: Can another family member or babysitter receive information through ParentSquare?

ParentSquare contains personally identifiable information for each student, therefore, only primary contacts who are designated as allowed to receive mail may sign up for a ParentSquare account.

ParentSquare Community Groups

Community members who do not currently have children attending our schools can receive school closing and delay notifications by signing up for the SSCSD ParentSquare Community Group. Click here for instructions on signing up for a SSCSD community group.
